bill_title: to continuously appropriate money to the state fair.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to continuously appropriate money to the state fair. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby annually appropriated from the South Dakota bred racing fund the sum of three hundred thousand dollars ($300,000), or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the state fair for operation of the state fair, fifty percent of which may be spent on 4-H activities. Section 2. The manager of the state fair shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
